Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute at Harrison/Leavitt
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harrison, Western, Taylor, Damen and Harrison, due to street blockage near Harrison/Leavitt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harrison, Western, Taylor, Damen and Harrison, due to street blockage near Harrison/Leavitt.

Allow extra travel time.
